subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Verlander became the first 19-game winner in the majors, Alex Avila hit his 15th homer and the American League Central-leading Detroit Tigers beat the Rays, 5-2.
snippet: Verlander became the first 19-game winner in the majors, Alex Avila hit his 15th homer and the American League Central-leading Detroit Tigers beat the Rays, 5-2.
